name: countries-react
description: * Step 1: Set your environment variables on the client and server * Step 2: Check if everything still works locally * Step 3: Build your react app * Step 4: Copy your build to your static directory on the server * Step 5: Create your start script for Heroku * Step 7: Create your Heroku app using heroku create * Step 8: Set your backend env vars on heroku * Step 9: Push you production ready code to Heroku
